CustomField.description: Field used in the Lump sum drawdown automated process
CustomField.formula: "ELF File: " & Primary_Contact__r.ELF_File_No__c & " - Customer: " & Primary_Contact__r.FirstName & ", " & Primary_Contact__r.LastName & " - Court File No.: " & Court_File_No__c
CustomField.label: LumpSum Drawdown Description
